Title: Windows 11 IoT Enterprise RAM Reduction Guide
Summary: This Jumpstart Drop provides instructions on how to minimize the RAM usage of Windows 11 IoT Enterprise systems.
Description: This repository offers a practical solution for optimizing Windows 11 IoT Enterprise by reducing its RAM usage. It includes a configure_services_final.bat batch file that utilizes the Windows sysprep package to streamline system services. By disabling non-essential services, commonly referred to as 'bloat', this guide helps achieve a significantly lower RAM footprint, thus enhancing the performance and reliability of IoT devices.
